extDescription: The BEST homepage for Chrome. Stunning themes, dozens of widgets, lightning fast, insanely customizable!
newtabDescription: The BEST homepage for Chrome. Now for new tab. Stunning themes, dozens of widgets, lightning fast, insanely customizable!

alert.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to do this?

storage.signin: Sign in to sync your settings
storage.signin_desc: iChrome has detected a sync profile under your email address.
storage.signin_desc2: Sign in with your Google account now to download and sync your configuration.

toolbar.placeholder_ok: Enter your terms or say "OK, Google"

background.title: Background
background.desc: This is the image or set of images shown as a background to your tabs

layout.title: Layout
layout.desc: Here you can adjust the type and number of columns in each tab

column_warning.column_to_grid: Changing to a grid-based layout will move all of your widgets to the top left corner.
column_warning.grid_to_column: Changing to a column-based layout will move all of your widgets to the first column.

theme.title: App theme
theme.desc: The app theme controls the style of iChrome itself and all widgets

style.title: Style
style.desc: This controls the style of the toolbar.  It can either appear normally or as an out of the way button

search.title: Search
search.desc: These settings control how the search box and voice search function
search.engines_custom_desc: Enter a URL that queries should be sent to, with %s where the query should go.
search.search_tab: Open search results in a new tab

links.title: Links
links.desc: These are the items shown at the right of the toolbar

misc.link_tab: Open links in a new tab by default

sync.status_syncing: iChrome is currently syncing your tabs and settings.
sync.status_notsyncing: iChrome is currently not syncing your tabs and settings.
sync.status_notsyncing2: Click Sync Now at the bottom of this page or sign in with your Google account to create a profile.
sync.duplicate_profile: A profile already exists under the email address below. To protect your security, iChrome can't use your sync profile until you verify that you own the address by signing in to your Google account.
sync.name: Name
sync.name_desc: We'll use this to address you inside iChrome and in any communications.
sync.email_desc: This is used to identify your sync profile, we'll also use it if we need to get in touch with you.
sync.signin_desc: Sign in with your Google account to easily and securely add new computers to your sync profile.
sync.signed_in: iChrome is connected to your Google account. Sign in on any new computers to instantly sync your configuration.
sync.keep_data_desc: Would you like to keep your local data, and replace the configuration on other computers you may have in this sync group with it, or replace this computer's configuration with theirs?

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.desc: Click the button an any backup to roll iChrome back to the time displayed.  You can also use the button below to create a manual backup.
backup.no_backups: No backups found, click Backup Now to create one.

restore.error: An error occurred while trying to parse the provided data, please try again later.
restore.confirm_desc: This will overwrite all local and synced data.
restore.confirm_desc2: You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers connected to this sync profile.

sync.reset_confirm_desc: This will erase all local and synced data, there is no backup and no way to undo this.
sync.reset_confirm_desc2: You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers connected to this sync profile.

store.instructions: Drag and drop any size onto your homepage

widgets.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you want to delete this widget?
This action is irreversible; all data from this widget will be permanently lost.

permissions_request.title: Access required
permissions_request.desc: This widget needs extra permissions before it can be used. Grant them using the button below.

error.explanation: Something went wrong while we were trying to display this widget.
error.advice: Try reinstalling the widget or reloading the page. Contact us if you see this message often.

auth.message: You'll need to give this widget access to your account before you can use it.

settings.title: Widget Title
settings.title_placeholder: Enter a widget title or leave blank to hide
settings.account_help:
If you're signed into multiple accounts, this is the "authuser=" value.

For example, if you're signed into two accounts, jsmith1@gmail.com and jsmith2@gmail.com, the "authuser" value for jsmith2@gmail.com would be 1 since it's the second account (counting from zero) that you're signed into.

themes.title: Themes
themes.author: By
themes.cached: This theme has been cached and is available offline
themes.random: This theme displays a random image every time you load the page
themes.random_daily: This theme displays an image picked randomly every day
themes.sunrise_sunset: This theme displays an image based on the time of day
themes.feed: This theme displays an image selected daily from an external feed
themes.video: This theme displays a live video
themes.pro_only: This theme is only available to Pro users. Buy Pro in the settings.
themes.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you would like to delete this theme?
This action is irreversible; the entire theme will be permanently lost.
themes.delete_error: An error occurred while trying to delete the theme.  Please try again later.
themes.feed_error: Something went wrong while trying to fetch the feed.  Please try again later.
themes.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the theme.  Please try again later

bginfo.pro_only: Only Pro users can download background images and videos

edit.title: Edit Theme
edit.name: Theme Name
edit.image_help:
Uploaded images cannot be synced between computers.

If this is important to you, please upload your image to a service such as imgur. Then copy and paste the URL ending with an extension (i.e. .jpg) and paste it into the field on the left.
edit.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the image you provided, please double-check the URL.
edit.upload_error: An error occurred while trying to upload the file you provided, please make sure that it's a reasonable size and an image.

slide1.title: Welcome to iChrome!
slide1.line1: If you want iChrome as your start page, you'll need to set the URL of this page in your settings (instructions). Otherwise, if you want it as a new tab or both home and new tab pages, please install iChrome New Tab instead.
slide1.newtab_line1: If you want iChrome to only show when you start Chrome and not every time you open a new tab please install the main iChrome extension instead of this one.
slide1.line2: This introduction is only 3 slides long and will give a quick overview of how to do basic things in iChrome.  When you're ready hit the next arrow at the right.

slide2.title: Widgets
slide2.line1: Widgets are the core of iChrome.  You can configure and move them using the wrench and handle icons shown when hovering at the top right.  To remove one, start dragging it and drop it onto the red bar that appears.
slide2.line2: New widgets can be added by clicking the Widgets item under the menu at the top right of the page (shown in the next slide).

slide3.title: Customizing
slide3.line1: You can change almost anything else you'd want to via the menu at the top right.  There you can configure the way your page looks, how iChrome works and get new widgets.
slide3.line2: Other things you can do include creating individual tabs, each with themes and widgets of their own, custom themes, or configuring the tiniest thing like what links are shown in the toolbar.
